thread.title: Kathleen lucas
thread.title_full: Prestige Flowers reviewed by Kathleen lucas

author: Kathleen lucas
title: Kathleen lucas
text: Do not go near this company they are liars and incompetant.they told me the flowers i ordered were delivered and signed for ( lies), then they said the flowers were still in storage,more lies,eventually flowers arrived 4 days late.this was the most deplorable company ever.surprise for my mums 82nd birthday ruined. Never again,would not reccomend this company at all.
